title: 'Jem and the Holograms' play with girl power spirit
text: 'Jem and the Holograms' play with girl power spirit Friday, 23 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) It's a compliment to director Jon M. Chu that I walked out of the "Jem and the Holograms" movie wanting to dot my review with a few pink heart emojis, because I walked into the theater with a giant chip on my shoulder.
